Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2007 09:39PM Sylvia59 wrote: I know exactly what you are talking about, Although my swelling was minimal the stiffness getting out of bed in the mornings, my drive to work in the mornings takes about 45mins. and by the time a reached by destination I would get out of the car walking like the Tin Man. It's been over 2 years now since my last treatment and sometimes I still get stiff but it is much better now. I also have Alopecia from the chemo drugs. Who knows what else lies ahead. Hope things inprove for you soon. SC
